Given the following signal declarations and concurrent signal assignments:

signal h, a, g, e: std_logic;
signal d, f: std_logic_vector(3 downto 0);
signal b, c: std_logic_vector(7 downto 0);

b <= "00100110";
c <= b(2 downto 0) & b(7 downto 3);
(d, f) <= (b(7 downto 4), b(3 downto 0));
h <= XOR(b);
a <= XNOR(b(5 downto 2));
(g, e) <= b(3 downto 2);

Using correct VHDL notation for literals, match each signal to its value.

Values:

(a) "0010"
(b) '1'
(c) "11000100"
(d) "0110"
(e) "00100110"
(f) '0'
(g) '1'
(h) '1'
